hero.title: Front-End React Developer <emoji>🚀</emoji>
hero.intro: Hello! I'm Bobby Ho. A passionate Front-End React Developer from Hong Kong <emoji> 🔥</emoji>

experience.title: Experience <emoji>🎯</emoji>
experience.frontendDevelopment: I'm proficient in responsive web design. I can build applications from scratch using CSS, HTML, and Javascript or using frameworks like React and Next.js with Tailwind CSS 🐳
experience.backendDevelopment: Not only specialize in frontend development, I also have experience in backend languages such as Node.js, Nest.js, and Express.js 🦅 building APIs using DTO patterns and third-party APIs such as Sanity, Stripe, and Shopify
experience.passionateProgrammer: I love utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques ⚡ Also enjoy writing clean, maintainable, and well-documented code to ensure code quality and best practices.
experience.teamPlayer: As a former HKUST Dragon Boat Team Captain 🐲 I understand the importance of teamwork and enjoy being a team player. That's why I'm confident in collaborating with cross-functional teams for high-quality product delivery.

project.title: Projects <emoji>🐣</emoji>
project.subtitle: Some of the projects I'm recently working on
project.startupWeb: Developed a fully responsive website for a startup. The site has a CMS for client to manage website content and E-commerce shop for their sales.
project.mobileApp: A simple Pomodoro Timer app using Flutter. You can customize your study timer and choose from a variety of aesthetic themes.

thisSite.title: About this site<emoji>🌞</emoji>
thisSite.subtitle: Performance first
thisSite.content: Built on [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) primitives like `@next/font` and `next/image` for stellar performance.

contact.title: Get in touch <emoji>🧙</emoji>
contact.content: Do you have a job opportunity or idea you'd like to discuss? Feel free to reach me on <githubUrl>Github</githubUrl> and <linkedinUrl>Linkedin</linkedinUrl>~
